title: Anbulla Sandhya Lyrics Kadhal Solla Vandhen lyrics
stanzas:
Singer : Karthik
Movie:    Kadhal Solla Vandhen
Song:    Anbulla Sandhya

Anbulla sandiyaa, unai naan kadhalikiren
nee sollum, oru vaarthai, adharkkaaga naan kaathiruppen
ennai enakku tharuvaayaa illai kaattil viduvaayaa
un badhilai edhirppaarthu ingey enadhu idhayam
enge enadhu idhayam.

Anbulla sandiyaa, unai naan kadalikiren
nee sollum, oru vaarthai, adharkkaaga.

Endhappakkam nee sellumbodhum 
endhan kaadhal aagaayam aagum
kannai moodikkondaalum maraiyadhey ....
Thooral vandhaal koalangal azhiyum 
kaalam vandhaal kalvettum azhiyum
endrum penney en kaadhal azhiyadhey ....
 
Adi koyil moodinaal kooda kili kavalaippaduvadhey illai
andha vaasal gopuram meedhu adhan kaadhal kuraivadhey illai
undhan kaaladi endhan vaazhvin veradi.

Anbulla sandiyaa, unai naan kadalikiren
nee sollum, oru vaarthai, adharkkaaga.

Thaayai kandaal thannaaley odum 
pillai poley en kaadhal aagum
anbey adhai un kangal ariyaadhaa ....
Endro yaaro un kaiyai thoduvaar
inbam thunbam ellaamey arivaai
anbey adhu naanaagakkoodaadhaa ....
 
Un kaadhal ennidam illai naan karaikka ninaikkiren kallai
Indha kaadhal enbadhey thollai uyiroadu erikkudhey ennai
Unnai neenginaal engey poven naanadi.

Anbulla sandiyaa, unai naan kadalikiren
nee sollum, oru vaarthai, adharkkaaga
